content: When calling the method, a programmer can simply separate the points by commas, without having to explicitly create an array of Point objects. Within the method, the points can be referenced as points[0], points[1], etc. If no points are passed, the array has a length of zero.
stemmed: when call method , programm simpli separ point comma , without explicitli creat array point object . within method , point referenc point [ 0 ] , point [ 1 ] , etc . If point pass , array length zero .
